alert.note: Alert for Copper River Basin (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 02 at 9:22AM AKDT until June 05 at 9:00PM AKDT by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY FOR SNOWMELT IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM AKDT MONDAY NEAR MOOSE CREEK IN GLENNALLEN... * WHAT...Flooding caused by snowmelt. * WHERE...Moose Creek in Glennallen. * WHEN...Until 900 AM AKDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding is occurring in low-lying areas along and near Moose Creek due to snowmelt, including the Glenn Highway west of Glennallen. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 906 AM AKDT, The Alaska Department of Transportation reports that high water levels are causing minor flooding of the Glenn Highway. Pilot car operations are in effect. Snowmelt will continue to produce minor flooding. Other local roads off the Glenn Highway may also be affected. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information.
